sense.def:
To subjugate a group of people
pomeni prevzeti popoln nadzor nad skupino ljudi, zlasti z zmago v vojni.

seg.quote: They wondered where Hitler would turn when he had subjugated Europe.
These people are resisting attempted subjugation by armed minorities.

sense.def:
Kadar želje nekega človeka
are subjugated to something
, jih ta obravnava kot manj pomembne od nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: She has subjugated her own desires to those of her husband.
